code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState={search:'',region:''};export var controlsSlice=createSlice({name:'controls',initialState:initialState,reducers:{setSearch:function setSearch(state,action){state.search=action.payload;},setSelect:function setSelect(state,action){state.region=action.payload;},clearControls:function clearControls(){return initialState;}}});var _controlsSlice$action=controlsSlice.actions,setSearch=_controlsSlice$action.setSearch,setSelect=_controlsSlice$action.setSelect,clearControls=_controlsSlice$action.clearControls;export{setSearch,setSelect,clearControls};export var controlsReducer=controlsSlice.reducer;export var selectSearch=function selectSearch(state){return state.controls.search;};export var selectSelect=function selectSelect(state){return state.controls.region;};export var selectControls=function selectControls(state){return state.controls;};
